title: srI rAghavEndhra
sahitya: shrI rAghavEndra satguru dhyAnamE!OrAyiram tAraka mandramiNai AgiDumE  anupallavi  ArAvamudan aravindan mukundanaisIrAga sEvitta palangaLai nalgina  caraNam  kaDal nIrum kani amudena inittiDumiDargaLum pani enak karaindinbam kanindiDumtoDar piRaviyil vanda tIvinai aganRiDumsudar oLi ena mantrAlayam tanil ninRiDum
